reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable for hot weather and appreciate its versatile style that can be dressed up or down. The material receives positive feedback for being soft and feeling like silk, with one customer noting it's easy to care for. Customers like the fit, with one mentioning it sits just above the knees, and they find it suitable for various occasions, from work to casual outings. The sizing receives mixed reviews, with some finding it true to size while others say it runs large. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute Dress that fits and washes well
items.body: I bought this dress in 4 colors becuase its so cool, comfy and looks great. On days Im out in the field, I like wearing cool and comfortable dresses that I can wear with sneakers. This dress is that and more. The color is vibrant, it washes well and is very comfortable. The fit is loose and the length was just above the knee (Im 5'0). This versatile little dress can be dressed up or down. I wore it to a tailgate with boots and a hat and it looked great. I wore one of these with sandals and jewlry and it looked casual dressy. The material is light but a good quality. Not see through or flimsy. Read more
items.author: MWJedi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress for any occasion
items.body: This dress is cute, soft and comfortable! Can be dressed up or worn very casual. Fit is perfect and cut is flattering. Read more
items.author: Mary Norman

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Fit
items.body: This is a basic sundress that can be worn multiple ways, such as with a t- shirt under it, a long sleeve shirt under it, with a sweater or jean jacket. There was a discoloration in the fabric. The fabric is very soft and comfortable. I ordered an XL and 5’6” and 185 lbs. The fit was perfect. Would I suggest this dress to others, yes, but be mindful of the discoloration in the fabric. Read more
items.author: Anita’s Trusted Take - Real opinions, Real products, Real Anita

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and cute
items.body: Nice fit. Runs a little big. Not sure about all the colors but the black and navy are flattering on curves. Polyester blend wouldn’t be great for hot/humid climates. But a nice day to night dress. If they hold up I will probably order more colors. Read more
items.author: Wendy Kelley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable & Cute
items.body: I bought two of these dresses in two different colors. I'm 5ft., 1" tall and approximately 115 pounds. I bought XS and both the fit and the length are perfect - hits a little above the knee and super comfortable. Very polyester finish but doesn't wrinkle easily and can be dressed up, dressed down, or worn as a heavier swimsuit cover up. Great value for the price. Read more
items.author: Denise Miller

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for me
items.body: Meh..material is not what I expected..I thought it would be more t shirt material but it is very thick. It's comfy enough, just not what I was looking for as it is more of a scuba sweatshirt material. Maybe that's what you are looking for though. Quality is good. Read more
items.author: BOYMOM2

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Essential Wardrobe Basic
items.body: Classic, easy piece that should be a staple in everyone's wardrobe! The fabric of this shift dress is SO soft, flowy, and slightly stretchy. It's constructed of a thicker breathable jersey that's not see-through (always a plus!) I loved the cream color as a base in my capsule wardrobe for traveling. This dress is so easy to wear, and can be dressed up or down. And while it has no pockets, it does have darts at the bust to provide shaping. Read more
items.author: Mizzus K

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits well and very comfortable
items.body: This is the second one that I have purchased. I love the fit and the feel of the fabric. I'm 5'6 and 157 lbs. I ordered the xl and it is a bit short, but I like it that way. I would wear it every day if I could. Read more
items.author: Ruby Brown

short_description:
Womens Dress Split Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress Split Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Tan, Wine, Lightblue, Royalblue, Fuchsia, Army Green, Black, Sage, Dustyblue, Lightbrown, Dark Green, Red, Lilac, Navy. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
